bibl.title: Copy of a Census Declaration from Oxyrhynchus.
Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall

bibl.note: Oxyrhynchus, 174 (?). - Description. - Ladies last. - Personal names. - Tachonsis, styled after her mother. - The oath.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Princ. Inv. Bell IX 19a = P. Bagnall 38
AnneMarie Luijendijk, Copy of a Census Declaration from Oxyrhynchus.

Rodney Ast, Hélène Cuvigny, Todd M. Hickey & Julia Lougovaya (edd.), Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall = American Studies in Papyrology. 53 (Durham, North Carolina, 2013) pp. 191-195, 1 fig.
Oxyrhynchus, 174 (?). - Description. - Ladies last. - Personal names. - Tachonsis, styled after her mother. - The oath.
